name: libpq
description: The official database access API of postgresql

client.description: Build all client tools and libraries.

icu.description: Build with support for the ICU library (--with-icu)

llvm.description: Build with support for LLVM based JIT compilation (--with-llvm)

openssl.description: support for encrypted client connections and random number generation on platforms that do not have "/dev/urandom" (except windows) (--with-openssl)

python.description: build the PL/Python server programming language (dynamic only?) (--with-python)

systemd.description: Build with support for systemd service notifications. (--with-systemd)

tcl.description: build the PL/Tcl procedural language(dynamic only?) (--with-tcl)

uuid.description: Build the uuid-ossp module (which provides functions to generate UUIDs) (--with-uuid=LIBRARY LIBRARY=(bsd|e2fs|ossp))
